name: Roxanne Colton
description: Roxxi was part of a mercenary duo withKimiko Sanchez, with her being the more experienced of the two. Most of their gigs resulted in a massive amount of collateral damages, and while Roxxi pretended to be the more responsible one, usually just as much of the destruction was her fault. Both were regulars at theForlorn Hopeand regularly had to be rescued from sticky situations by its patrons. During theFourth Corporate War, Kissy and Roxxie were involved in a battle againstAdam Smasherin a neighbourhood inRancho Coronado. The two of them managed to survive while most of the neighbourhood were...
